title: Phase 2: Bezier curve linearization
description: Parse cubic bezier curves (C commands) from vectorPaths and linearize using adaptive subdivision with configurable tolerance. Convert curves to line segments for G-code output.

title: Phase 4: Single-line text with Hershey fonts
description: Embed Hershey font stroke data for single-line text rendering. Add text input to UI. Warn when TextNode selected and offer Hershey alternative to avoid double-stroke outlines.

title: Phase 3: Path optimization - minimize pen-up travel
description: Reorder paths using nearest-neighbor algorithm to minimize pen-up travel distance. Consider path reversal when endpoint is closer. Merge connected paths to reduce pen cycles.

title: Phase 1: Basic G-code generation - lines and UI
description: Build the foundation: UI with settings (units, scale, feed rate, pen Z heights), path extraction from Figma vectorPaths, and basic G-code generation for line segments. Output to text preview and file download.
close_reason: Implemented basic G-code generation with UI settings, path extraction from vectors/rectangles/ellipses/lines, and file download
